transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] हैंडीक्राफ्ट ना मैं बात करती हूं उससे एक बार।
Executive: Hello. Hello? Hi good afternoon. Sushmita bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Wo aapko na call aaya tha na morning me TDS refund ke liye mam.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Aapka TDS refund karane ke liye subah call aaya tha na maine.
Customer: Rukiye rukiye rukiye rukiye rukiye.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye mai dusre mam ko.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello? Hello?
Customer: Haan haan wo TDS refund ke liye meri baat hui thi na aapse morning me.
Executive: Haan haan boliye na.
Executive: Okay. Mam wo TDS refund ka humne yaha se initiate kar diya hai. Maine aapko screenshot bhi bhej diya aapke WhatsApp pe aap check kar sakte ho. To matlab jaise hi aapka within two to three working days me aapke account me aa jayega mam.
Customer: Haan lekin wo aaj show ho raha hai kya payment?
Executive: Nahi aaj show nahi hoga. Hamare side se initiate ho gaya hai. Within two to three working days aapke paas aa jayega. Aapko maine WhatsApp pe screenshot bhi bhej diya hai ki hamare account team se transfer ka done karke likh ke aa gaya hai.
Customer: Theek hai mam. Matlab three or four days me.
Executive: Haan within two to three working days me aise aayega ki two four working days me aa jayega. Baki ka aapko mere se follow up karna hoga, puchna hoga to aap mujhe WhatsApp pe maine message kiya hai na, aap mujhe wo number save kar lijiye aap mujhe us pe message kar dijiyega mai us pe aapko bata dungi, theek hai mam?
Customer: Ha okay.
Executive: Theek hai to abhi aapka ticket mai close kar du mam?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai chaliye. Thank you so much for your time sir mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Regarding TDS refund status.



Resolution:

- Refund initiated, screenshot sent on WhatsApp.

- Refund will reflect in 2-3 working days.

- Shared WhatsApp number for follow-up.



Next Steps: 

- Ticket will be closed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tds refund, whatsapp, payment status, follow up
